name: GHOST942
description:
GHost942 is the eighth game in the series, - previously preceded by Hack9 (2008), Hacker9 (2010), GHost9 (2011), Hack9Solid (2012), GHost92 (2012), GHost93 (2013) and GHost94 (2014) respectively - an action platformer with stealth mechanics.

The player takes on the role of the main protagonist of the series agent "Snout" who was ordered the invasion and information collection to the mysterious organization. With additional new "Lost Level" scenarios, the gameplay is largely unchanged. GHost942 is a two dimensional free-roaming platformer set in a three-dimensional world, where the player can rotate between different perspective. This rotation mechanics reveals new paths, which allows the player to reach platforms or locations and solve puzzles. There’s also a first-person perspective for shooting at enemies and manipulating objects, and many NPCs with dialogue.

Similar to GHost94, the game also features HD option for higher screen resolution. GHost942 was released at Comiket 87, on December 30, 2014.
